Title: Requires at least one electric charging station for every one hundred fifty thousand New York state residents
Summary: Requires at least one electric charging station available to the public for every one hundred fifty thousand New York state residents; requires construction and development of such stations to comply with article 8 of the labor law including payment of the prevailing wage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring at least one electric charging station for every one hundred fifty thousand New York state residents
